resource.name: AU Primary Care Follow UP
resource.description: This profile defines a follow up structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context. It uses a CarePlan resource, but is not intended to be a fully fledged Care Plan. CarePlans may be profiled in the future to support a proper Care Plan in the Australian primary care context.
